AuthLayout.text: Tutory has completely transformed the way I plan and manage my lessons. The AI-generated suggestions save me hours each week, and the student tracking helps me stay on top of individual progress. It's like having an extra assistant in the classroom!

Login.title: Welcome back 👋
Login.description: Enter your email and password to log in your account

Register.title: Welcome 👋
Register.description: Fill out below from and create your account for free

validation.numLetters: Both numbers, letters and special characters

ResetPassword.title: Reset password
ResetPassword.description: Enter your email to reset your password
ResetPassword.label: Email

Success.title: Password reset email has been sent
Success.description: Please check your email for instructions to reset your password

RecoverPassword.title: Set a new password
RecoverPassword.description: Enter your new password to reset your password

Schedule.addNewDescription: Fill out below form to add a new lesson
Schedule.changeLessonDescription: Fill out below form to change the lesson

DeleteModal.title: Delete lesson
DeleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this lesson? you won't be able to recover this action after the process

editProfileModal.title: Edit profile
editProfileModal.error: Something went wrong, try again later

CreateMaterial.title: Create a new material
CreateMaterial.bannerTitle: Create personalized AI-powered activities for English teachers!
CreateMaterial.bannerSubTitle: Build tasks that can be exported as PDFs, accessed on the website, completed with students during lessons, or assigned as homework.

outputLoading.title: Just a few seconds!
outputLoading.subTitle: Please wait a moment while the AI generates a response.

text.title: Create a text on a certain topic
text.subTitle: Create a text
text.description: Creates a text on a certain topic. Can be used during a lesson or as a homework task after a reading, listening or vocabulary lesson.

reading.title: Create open questions to the text
reading.subTitle: Open Questions
reading.description: Creates a list of open questions. Ask your students these questions to make sure they understand the text.

ABCD.title: Create ABCD questions for a text
ABCD.subTitle: ABCD Questions
ABCD.description: Creates a list of ABCD questions for a text with only one correct answer.

trueFalse.title: Create True/False statements based on text
trueFalse.subTitle: True / False
trueFalse.description: Creates a true/false reading exercise for the student to check if they understand the content of the text.

fill.title: Create fill in the gap question based on text
fill.subTitle: Fill in the Gap
fill.description: Replaces all the chosen words in the text with gaps. Gives a list of these words separately.

vocabulary.title: Essential vocabulary on the topic
vocabulary.subTitle: Essential Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Suggests a list of essential vocabulary items for the chosen topic. Use this list in the other Tutory tools to create a variety of exercises for your lesson.

matching.title: Create a matching exercise word-definition
matching.subTitle: Matching Exercise
matching.description: Automatically creates a matching exercise for a list of words. Ask your student to match the word to its meaning!

list.title: Create a list of sentences with your vocabulary
list.subTitle: Sentence List
list.description: Creates a list of sentences with target vocabulary. It's a great idea to use them later in the 'Fill in the Gap' tool!

exercise.title: Create an exercise with matching halves
exercise.subTitle: Matching Halves
exercise.description: Creates an exercise for your  students in which they need to correctly match the halves of  collocations, sentences, and so on. It's an excellent way to practise or revise grammar and vocabulary chunks.

wordTranslation.title: Word-Translation matching
wordTranslation.subTitle: Word Translation
wordTranslation.description: This tool translates a list of  words or phrases into different world languages and creates a matching  exercise. Use it for vocabulary presentation and revision in bilingual  classrooms.

findQuotes.title: Find quotes by famous people on the topic
findQuotes.subTitle: Famous Quotes
findQuotes.description: Creates a list of quotes by famous people. Perfect for warm-ups, discussions, and essay topics.

list.title: Create a list of opinions by random people
list.subTitle: Opinion List
list.description: Creates four opinions by random people on the topic. Use it to encourage students to consider different points of view.

link.title: Link words into sentences based on your text
link.subTitle: Link Words
link.description: Creates an exercise for students to create unique sentences by connecting words given in each prompt.

writing.title: Creative writing with target vocabulary
writing.subTitle: Creative Writing
writing.description: Gives a set of creative writing  tasks to encourage your students to use the new vocabulary. These  include social media posts, comments, emails, reviews and so on.

discussion.title: Find discussion questions based on your text
discussion.subTitle: Discussion Questions
discussion.description: Creates discussion questions on a given topic. You can use them as a warm-up or at any other stage of your lesson.

list.title: Create a list of advantages and disadvantages
list.subTitle: Pros and Cons
list.description: Creates a list of advantages and disadvantages on a topic. Great for discussions or debates.

quotes.title: Find quotes by famous people on the topic
quotes.subTitle: Famous Quotes
quotes.description: Creates a list of quotes by famous people. Perfect for warm-ups, discussions, and essay topics.

opinions.title: Create a list of opinions by random people
opinions.subTitle: Opinion List
opinions.description: Creates four opinions by random people on the topic. Use it to encourage students to consider different  points of view and evaluate arguments.

link.title: Link words into sentences based on your text
link.subTitle: Link Words
link.description: Creates an exercise in which a  student is expected to come up with unique sentences by logically  connecting the words given in each prompt. Can be used as a writing or a speaking exercise.

fill.title: Create fill in the gap question based on text
fill.subTitle: Fill in the Gap
fill.description: Replaces all the chosen words in the text with gaps. Gives a list of these words separately.

exercise.title: Create an exercise with matching halves
exercise.subTitle: Matching Halves
exercise.description: Creates an exercise for your  students in which they need to correctly match the halves of  collocations, sentences, and so on. It's an excellent way to practise or revise grammar and vocabulary chunks.

scramble.title: Scramble the words in sentences
scramble.subTitle: Word Scramble
scramble.description: Mixes up all the words in a  sentence. Ask your student to put the words in the right order. You can  give this task to practice word order in questions or grammar  structures.

first.title: AI Plan Generation
first.subTitle: Currently, AI generation works best for English. For other languages, the quality is basic.

second.title: Start From Scratch
second.subTitle: Create your own plan from scratch with no AI assistance or predefined structure.

startStep.title: Start
startStep.subTitle: Fill out the information about the student and the plan
startStep.labelUploadFile: File based on which the learning plane will be created

scheduleStep.title: Set up your AI schedule
scheduleStep.subTitle: Enter the lesson schedule with your student.

levelNowStep.title: Level now
levelNowStep.subTitle: Fill in the information about the student's current level of knowledge.
levelNowStep.levelPlaceholder: The student has a basic level of English, B2.
levelNowStep.topicLabel: Which topics does the student confidently know?

goalStep.title: Goal
goalStep.subTitle: Fill in the information about the student's goal level of knowledge.
goalStep.achieveLabel: What does the student want to achieve as a result of the learning?
goalStep.achievePlaceholder: Professional proficiency in English at the C1 level, with strong conversational skills.
goalStep.testLabel: What tests does the student plan to take, and what is the deadline? (Optional)
goalStep.testLabelPlaceholder: To take the international Duolingo test in six months.

labels.name: Stage title
labels.lessonsQuantity: Enter number of lessons you want to generate
labels.lessonsQuantityPlaceholder: Enter number of lessons you want to generate
labels.deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this stage?

LogoutModal.title: Log out
LogoutModal.text: Are you sure you want to log out?

DeleteMaterialModal.title: Delete Material
DeleteMaterialModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this material?
